```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(MASS)
library(dplyr)

# Example data set of Eye- Diameter at 72hpf
wt_e <- rnorm(n=30 , mean=290 , sd=50)


null_e <-rnorm( n=30 , mean=240 , sd=50)




eye_size_df <- data.frame(WTeyesize = wt_e , Nulleyesize = null_e)

str(eye_size_df)

#make long

# then evalute the group(wt/null)~ value(eyesize)
one.way <-aov(Nulleyesize~WTeyesize, data= eye_size_df)

summary(one.way) 



```
